New Records: Jordan Poole scored 30 points to continue his strongest stretch in a Washington uniform
Key Match Events: Washington effectively sealed the outcome with a 7-0 run early in the fourth to build a 20-point lead
Rookie Kyshawn George hit his lone 3-pointer of the night to open the spurt, then completed it with a steal and dunk that made it 104-84
Pre-Game Insights: There is no information about pre-game quotes or observations in the article
Post-Match Reflections: There is no information about post-match comments from players or coaches in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls finished 29.8% (14 of 47) from 3-point range, well below their 37.2% average entering Wednesday
Others: The Wizards are still last in the Eastern Conference at 6-25 but have been playing far more competitive basketball
Washington is 4-6 since the start of December
